content: That's really helpful. I think I'll start by creating a daily routine that includes time blocks for cleaning, cooking, and laundry. I'll also try to batch similar tasks together to optimize my time. But how do I handle tasks that don't have a specific time block, like doing a load of laundry or wiping down the kitchen counters? Should I just fit them in whenever I have some extra time, or is there a better way to handle them?
